abilities.name: Self-repair Mechanisms
abilities.rule: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Mechanicus Bodyguard
abilities.rule: While this model is within 3" of one or more other friendly **ADEPTUS MECHANICUS** units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Canticles of the Omnissiah
abilities.rule: At the start of the battle round, select one of the abilities in the Canticles of the Omnissiah section. Until the start of the next battle round, this model has that ability.

custom_rules.title: Canticles of the Omnissiah
custom_rules.text:
Shroudpsalm (Aura)
While a friendly **ADEPTUS MECHANICUS** unit is within 6" of this model, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, that unit has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
Mantra of Discipline
This model has the **BATTLELINE** keyword and has the following ability:

**Binharic Courage (Aura):** While a friendly **ADEPTUS MECHANICUS** unit is within 6" of this model, each time you take a Battle-shock or Leadership test for that unit, add 1 to that test.
Invocation of Machine Vengeance (Aura)
While a friendly **ADEPTUS MECHANICUS** unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.
